blog.name: incorrect-marauders
blog.title: incorrect marauders quotes
blog.description: incorrect quotes (or are they totally correct?) said by moony, padfoot, wormtail, and prongs. lilykins, snivellus, and minnie make some appearances.

summary:
James: Oh, come on! I didn't drink that much last night!
Remus: You were flirting with Lily.
James: So what? She's my...
body:
James: Oh, come on! I didn't drink that much last night!
Remus: You were flirting with Lily.
James: So what? She's my wife.
Remus: You asked if she was single.
Sirius: And then cried when she said she wasn't.

dialogue.name: James
dialogue.label: James:
dialogue.phrase: Oh, come on! I didn't drink that much last night!

summary: Marauders: Trash
title: Marauders: Trash
body:
McGonagall, angrily pointing at the mess that the Marauders made on their latest prank: That's enough! Take that pile of filth out!
Severus, laughing in the background:
James, shaking his head: Professor! You shouldn't talk about Severus like that!

summary: Do you know what i want? A modern day hogwarts. No old characters. A group of witches and wizards just going through their daily...
body: Do you know what i want? A modern day hogwarts. No old characters. A group of witches and wizards just going through their daily lives and teenage drama. No dark wizards or big villains. Just a television series about the life at hogwarts.

summary: So I'm in Edinburgh
body:
So I’m in Edinburgh

…and I am so excited to attend the Potter Trail unofficial Harry Potter tour today at 2pm.

I’m less happy that I’m the only one in my group that wants to go, but I WILL GO ALONE THEN. (Their loss!)

I just really want a Potter fan to adventure with around the city. I might try to recruit one from the tour group haha

summary: Marauders: What is Love?
title: Marauders: What is Love?
body:
Lily: Love's like the Muggle tale of Beauty and the Beast!
Sirius, flipping his hair: Love is what you are looking at, right now.
Remus, pausing in drinking his fourth mug of coffee for the morning: There's no such thing as love.

dialogue.name: Lily
dialogue.label: Lily:
dialogue.phrase: Love's like the Muggle tale of Beauty and the Beast!

blog.name: riseofthephoenixscreenplay
blog.title: Rise of the Phoenix
blog.description: Rise of the Phoenix is a fanmade screenplay written by L.B. Fleury. Set in the Marauders' Era, this story focuses on the rise of the Order of the Phoenix during the First Wizarding War. New episodes every Saturday at 6PM (UTC/GMT). Series 2 resumes on March 2nd, 2019. → For mobile users: SERIES 1 (direct link).

fantastic beasts and where to find them
summary: Harry Potter The Musical (AKA Sweeney Todd).
title: Harry Potter The Musical (AKA Sweeney Todd).
body:
Old Grindelwald: has been banished for years, but has returned in search of the love he lost many years ago. Has a major penchant for violence and some very interesting hair.

Young Grindelwald: Guy comes to London, falls in love. Love story goes to hell very quickly when people start trying to kill one another. Kind-of a creeper.

Bellatrix: overly attached to a really weird guy who shares her penchant for violence and love of extremely odd hair. Also looks like she’s going to eat you.

Wormtail: rat-faced bastard who is also right-hand man of the villain. Delivers the young ingenue and her child to the villain.

Snape: asshat who was overly attached to a woman who didn’t want anything to do with him, and now has an extremely unhealthy love/hate relationship with her child.

AND FOR BONUS POINTS:

Lily: the fabled lovely woman who has a young child, is lusted after by a villain, and eventually terribly injured through the his scheming, leaving her only child, just an infant, to be raised alone by someone absolutely awful. Played by different people, but let’s face it they’re exactly the same character.

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2027. Nearly three decades have passed since the battle at Hogwarts and the...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2027. Nearly three decades have passed since the battle at Hogwarts and the wizarding world continues its uphill climb towards a slow, tumultuous recovery. Danger lurks around every corner as the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the wizarding community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application
